title: Hotel rates set to go through the roof for Christmas and New Year
description: Hundreds of marriage receptions taking place in hotels along with greater domestic traveller demand are also escalating rates for the Christmas-New Year period. Some hotels are already booked out. The Leela Palace Udaipur will cost ₹1,06,200 for a night's stay on Christmas on Booking.com, while the rate at Six Senses Fort Barwara for the same date is ₹1,64,919.
